type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Cooldown

---



[Item Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_action_types/cooldown)

Sets the cooldown of the stack's associated item.

Type ID: `apugli:cooldown`



---

### Examples

```json
"item_action": {
    "type": "apugli:cooldown",
    "ticks": 200
}
```

This example will set the stack's item to 200 ticks/10 seconds. This will affect all items of this type.

ticks.description: The amount of ticks that the cooldown should be active for.
